original_text:
And if you ask yourself,
    “Why has this happened to me?”—
it is because of your many sins
    that your skirts have been torn off
    and your body mistreated.
korean_text: 네가 마음으로 이르기를 어찌하여 이런 일이 내게 닥쳤는고 하겠으나 네 죄악이 크므로 네 치마가 들리고 네 발뒤꿈치가 상함이니라

sentences.original_text: Why has this happened to me?
it is because of your many sins
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 네게 많은 죄가 있기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: that your skirts have been torn off
